verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Love the Lord your God
Love the Lord, Your God
With all your heart, your soul and strength
With all your heart, your soul and strength.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Receive the Holy Spirit
Receive the Holy Spirit
Of God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I love my Lord my God
I love my Lord my God
With all your heart, your soul and strength
With all your heart, your soul and strength.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come Holy Spirit
Come Holy Spirit
Burn in me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I love you Lord my God
I love you Lord my God
Only because you loved me first
Only because you loved me first.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come fire of love
Come fire of love
Burn in me.
